title: Simple chicken curry
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons ginger puree or paste', '2 teaspoons garlic puree or paste', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '4 teaspoons mild curry powder', '1/4 teaspoon chilli powder', '1 large onion, chopped', 'oil', '4 chicken breast fillets, diced', '200ml coconut milk', '2 teaspoons tomato puree', '300ml stock or water', '2 teaspoons garam masala']
